author: sky.cactus
content: <@689161464829050960> I *think* the consensus in here was that 3074 should be an opcode rather than a precompile.  It was weak, but I didn't hear anyone defending precompile and there were non-zero people weakly lobbying for opcode.

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm also weakly in opcode camp now as well.
